|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q128CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB64M16GP-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Winstars WS-WN7615HA-C <!-- V1.2 --> |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615N;ARM, MT7615N, 1752-BFSL, ACMS2CL4; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Winstars WS-WN7603N-A |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603EN;MT7603EN, 1728-BMAL, CTPFAP32; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WS-WN551A6-A V1.1" and "2018-02-02" are silkscreened on the board.
Will likely be released as "SimpliNET-2," the second generation of [https://www.simplinet.net/ SimpliNET]. :The first gen was a [[Winstars WS-WN535G3E]].
[[Category:English Documentation]]
